alert.note: Alert for Northern Berkshire; Southern Berkshire (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 19 at 9:12PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Berkshire County through 1000 PM EDT... At 911 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Adams to near Cheshire to Lee. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... North Adams and Adams around 915 PM EDT. Savoy around 920 PM EDT. Becket and Florida around 925 PM EDT. Monroe around 930 PM EDT. Hawley around 935 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Hairpin Turn, Greylock, Soldiers Memorial Field, Cheshire Harbor, Arnoldville, Glendale, Williamsville, Lenox Dale, Braytonville and Berkshire. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
